attributes.action: notice that you apologised about the children who was extradicted to austrialia from the uk all those years ago, but what about the children who are getting removed now?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we understand that the prime minister has apologised for the extrication of many children and babies during the 40-50's recently but we want something done about the children and babies that have been removed for false reasons by local authorities and family courts, there are many cases that have been in the media and also them that have not reached, but we request that a stop is put to this evil practice by the local authorities and family courts one and for all, if there is no proof of any kind of issues and no evidence then no children should be removed..

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
